fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm upgrade report log ordering and limit
fields.request_details:
1. Generate more than 30 auto-upgrade log entries (simulate upgrades or append test lines).
2. Open the Upgrade Report in the Django admin.
3. Verify the Recent activity table lists only the 30 most recent entries with the newest timestamps at the top.
4. Confirm older log lines no longer appear beyond the 30-entry limit.
